sentence.Network_en: "I changed my mind," Blanche said, resuming her seat.
sentence.Network_cn: “我改变主意了，”布兰奇说着回到她的座位上。

sentence.Network_en: She was in no mood to put up with Blanche's carping.
sentence.Network_cn: 她心情不好，受不了布兰奇的吹毛求疵。

sentence.Network_en: They gave him carte blanche to make decisions.
